name: Codelock Guessing Simulator
description:
This game was made for Jamulator 2021, which is a jam for creating simulation games.

In this game, you do exactly what the title says - you guess codes. For every code you guess you get money, which you can spend on revealing digits of the code. 

There is no secret to be found, so keep on guessing codes and do not look for a secret. Don't waste your time.

Instructions on how to play the game as it can get confusing at times:

  • To select a difficulty, click the button "DIF", select a difficulty via the keypad and click the green button.
  • To reveal digits, click on "UPG" and click the green button, if you have enough money a digit will be revealed. You can see the cost by standing by after clicking "UPG", the text changes.
  • To view your statistics, click "STAT". Stand by after clicking "STAT" for the text to change.
  • If you accidentally click "EXIT", do not click the green button (as it will close the game, duh), instead click the red button or select a difficulty, and you can keep playing the game.

Leaving a comment would be greatly appreciated!
